structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY CLASSIFICATION, BOUNDARIES, AND ALTERNATIVE METHOD OF CONSOLIDATING GOVERNMENTAL SERVICES

law.catch_line: Form of question to be submitted to voters.
law.text: The question submitted to the qualified voters in the affected area under KRS 81.300 to 81.360 shall be in substantially the following form: "Do you favor the proposed Plan for the Improvement of Local Government in .......... County submitted by the fiscal court calling for (1) regrouping and reorganization of certain governmental service functions, and (2) extension of the city limits of ..........? YES .... NO ....".
law.history: Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 8, effective May 18, 1956.
